description: Mike De Marko has plans to go on a run with his best friend and her hot as fuck husband, Adam Bryant. Sadly, his friend is out for the count but he manages to convince Adam to come along anyway. After a long run, Mike suggests to Adam that he showers off his sweaty cock and balls before returning home to his wife. While in the shower, Mike jumps in and somehow convinces Adam to show him exactly what his friend has been raving about.
title: My Best Friend's Husband Part 2
